name: Golf
overview: Tee off for 18 holes of realistic 3-D links! Virtual Boy Golf elevates the game to an incredible new level! Determine your strategy as you ponder the conditions. Check your position and the distance to the pin. Select a club and adjust your swing. Consider the wind factor carefully or you could end up out of bounds! Each dimensional fairway provides harrowing hazards to challenge players of all handicaps. Swing into action and go for a hole in one!
